original_text: Pilate knew why the Jewish leaders had brought Jesus to him. They were jealous because people liked Jesus so much.
korean_text: 이는 그가 그들의 시기로 예수를 넘겨 준 줄 앎이더라

sentences.original_text: Pilate knew why the Jewish leaders had brought Jesus to him
sentences.korean_translation: 빌라도는 유대 지도자들이 예수를 그에게 데려온 이유를 알고 있었다

sentences.original_text: because people liked Jesus so much
